articles.description: He had hand-written a 17-page note titled « Betrayal and Consequences, » police said.
articles.content:
So he went up to Mughoi and stabbed her repeatedly. Then, he slit his throat. Hours later, they were pronounced dead.

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Facebook, eBay crack down on fake reviews at UK request
articles.description: Britain's competition watchdog says Facebook and eBay have pledged to crack down on the trade in fake reviews at its request. The companies have removed hundreds of accounts, pages and groups involved in the illicit business
articles.content: Facebook removed 188 pages and groups and disabled 24 accounts that were involved in the fake review trade, some on its Instagram platform. Some of the pages and groups were identified by the agency, others were found by Facebook. Some of the groups offered i… [+1448 chars]

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Germany says asylum applications dropped 14% last year
articles.description: Germany says new asylum applications in the country dropped more than 14% last year
articles.content:
Syrians were easily the biggest single group of asylum-seekers, with 26,453 making applications. They were followed by 10,894 people from Iraq, 10,275 from Turkey, 7,778 from Iran and 7,124 from Afghanistan.
In December, 6,771 applications were made in total… [+496 chars]

articles.author: Laurie Mcginley
articles.title: Cancer death rate posts biggest one-year drop ever
articles.description: The cancer death rate in 2017 posted the largest single-year drop ever recorded, as continued declines in smoking and new treatments reduced the lung cancer mortality rate, according to a new report issued Wednesday by the American Cancer Society.
articles.content:
The cancer death rate in the United States fell 2.2 percent in 2017 the biggest single-year drop ever reported propelled by gains against lung cancer, the American Cancer Society said Wednesday.
Declines in the mortality rate for lung cancer have accelerated… [+4727 chars]
